description: Numbers n such that phi(2n-1) < phi(2n), where phi is Euler's totient function A000010.
references: N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
V. L. Klee, Jr., Some remarks on Euler's totient function, Amer. Math. Monthly, 54 (1947), 332.
J. Shallit, Letter to N. J. A. Sloane, Jul 17 1975
maple: with(numtheory): A001836:=n->`if`(phi(2*n-1) < phi(2*n), n, NULL): seq(A001836(n), n=1..5*10^3); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 10 2014
prog: (PARI) is(n)=eulerphi(2*n-1)<eulerphi(2*n) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Feb 21 2013(Haskell)a001836 n = a001836_list !! (n-1)a001836_list = f a000010_list 1 where   f (u:v:ws) x = if u < v then x : f ws (x + 1) else f ws (x + 1)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 11 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Corrected and extended by Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Jan 04 2007
